hebrewFromSub: טוב אני ישבתי בחדר שלי וצפיתי בשידורים חוזרים של "משפחת בריידי"
englishFromSub: Well I've been sitting in my room watching "Brady Bunch" reruns
englishTranslation: Well I sat in my room and watched reruns of "The Brady Family"

hebrewFromSub: אתה תמיד יכול לגרום לי לצחוק זאק
englishFromSub: You could always make me laugh Zack
englishTranslation: You can always make me laugh Zack

hebrewFromSub: זו בושה שאנחנו לא מרגישים אותו הדבר כלפי המשפחה והילדים שלנו
englishFromSub: It's a shame we don't feel the same way about our family and children
englishTranslation: It is a shame that we do not feel the same way about our family and children

hebrewFromSub: אולי זה מפני שהייתי ילד ורציתי את כל תשומת-לבך בשבילי
englishFromSub: Maybe that's because I was an only child and wanted all of your attention for myself
englishTranslation: Maybe it's because I was a kid and I wanted all your attention for me

englishFromSub: - Talks about you all the time

hebrewFromSub: -מקווה שתאהבו את המנה המיוחדת של הערב
englishTranslation: - Hope you like the special dish of the evening

englishFromSub: It's a little surprise Max cooked up
englishTranslation: This is a little surprise that Max baked

hebrewFromSub: אז האם תשקלי לתת לי עוד הזדמנות
englishFromSub: So would you consider giving me another chance
englishTranslation: So will you consider giving me another chance

englishFromSub: I'd have to think about it
englishTranslation: I need to think about it

hebrewFromSub: טוב זאק אתה יכול להסכים עם העובדה שזה קשה להיות לבד כשיש לך ילדים
englishFromSub: Well Zack can you accept the fact that it's hard to be alone when you have children
englishTranslation: Well Zack you can agree with the fact that it's hard to be alone when you have kids

hebrewFromSub: אני מתכוון אני רוצה לעשות את זה
englishFromSub: I mean I want to do it
englishTranslation: I mean I want to do it

hebrewFromSub: כן אבל לפעמים נחמד גם להיות לבד
englishFromSub: Yeah but at times it's nice to be alone too
englishTranslation: Yes but sometimes it's nice to be alone too
Forgive me the time is up

hebrewFromSub: מר בלדינג אני מצטערת סלייטר ואני לא יכולנו לגרום לנישואים שלנו לעבוד
englishFromSub: Mr Belding I'm sorry Slater and I couldn't make our marriage work
englishTranslation: Mr. Bleding I'm sorry Slater and I could not make our marriage work

hebrewFromSub: ג'סי לפעמים שני אנשים פשוט לא מתאימים
englishFromSub: Jessie sometimes two people just aren't compatible
englishTranslation: Jesse sometimes two people just do not fit

hebrewFromSub: הדבר החשוב הוא ששני הזוגות ניסו לתקשר והצליחו
englishFromSub: The important thing is that both couples tried to communicate and they succeeded
englishTranslation: The important thing is that both couples tried to communicate and succeeded

hebrewFromSub: אני חושב שכולכם למדתם המון על עצמכם
englishFromSub: I think you all learned a lot about yourselves
englishTranslation: I think you all learned a lot about yourself

hebrewFromSub: זאק יש לי את ההפתעה הזו בשבילך
englishFromSub: Zack I have that surprise for you
englishTranslation: Zack I have this surprise for you

hebrewFromSub: זוכר שבפרויקט שלנו סיפרתי לך על ילד נוסף
englishFromSub: Remember in our project I told you about another child
englishTranslation: Remember that in our project I told you about another child

englishFromSub: Maybe we can get the house painted
englishTranslation: Put a wolf in the house

hebrewFromSub: הארייט  נראה לך שהילדים יאהבו אותי יותר
englishFromSub: Harriette why did you make me lie to my mother like that
englishTranslation: Harriet seems to you that the kids will love me more
